Class CommonLivingEntity<T extends org.bukkit.entity.LivingEntity>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.bases.ExtendedEntity<T>
      • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.entity.CommonEntity<T>
        • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.entity.type.CommonLivingEntity<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - - type of Living Entity
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CommonPlayer

    public class CommonLivingEntity<T extends org.bukkit.entity.LivingEntity>
extends CommonEntity<T>
    A Common Entity implementation for Living Entities

      • getTargetBlock

        public org.bukkit.block.Block getTargetBlock()
        Performs ray tracing from the head of this Entity towards where this Entity looks. The maximum interaction distance (5.0) is used. Unlike the default getTargetBlock, this method gets the actual highlighted block by this Living Entity.
        Returns:
        the first Block hit, or null if none was found (AIR)

      • getTargetBlock

        public org.bukkit.block.Block getTargetBlock(double maxDistance)
        Performs ray tracing from the head of this Entity towards where this Entity looks. Unlike the default getTargetBlock, this method gets the actual highlighted block by this Living Entity.
        Parameters:
        maxDistance - to ray trace
        Returns:
        the first Block hit, or null if none was found (AIR)

      • getMovement

        public org.bukkit.util.Vector getMovement()
        Gets the movement this Living Entity is performing. It points to the direction the Entity is trying to 'go' to. In the case of Players, this is the WASD movement direction.
        Returns:
        Movement direction

      • getForwardMovement

        public double getForwardMovement()
        Gets the forward movement this Living Entity is performing. This value is negative when moving backwards.
        Returns:
        Forward movement
